price: Sakupite one koji su nepravdu učinili i njima slične i one koje su obožavali,
arabic: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: uḥ'shurū alladhīna ẓalamū wa-azwājahum wamā kānū yaʿbudūna
